description:
Performance Maintainer has combined open source tool such as Little registry Cleaner, Bleachbit and Ultradefrag that run periodically for PC maintenance and performance. It is simple and automated.  

* 1. Little Registry Cleaner Scan and Cleans the registry

* 2. Bleachbit Performs Disk Cleanup

* 3. Ultradefrag defragments System Drive.

The Programs also allows to install additional tools for tweaking and better performance.

Disk, registry Cleanup and disk defragmentation in one click
Scheduled maintenance to maintain system speed.
summary: Performance Maintainer - open source tools for regular maintenance of Disk, Registry and Processes.
author: PC Starters
